topic.title: I can help the development of the fork
topic.body: I'm not a coder, but i can set up new server side infrastructures like trackers, proxies and seedboxes and i can also give you some money for the development.  this fork have any compiled working version now to do some tests?

1616711390_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk.body:
> [geekless](#comment_14_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4): v3 seems working when opening a site by direct link http://127.0.0.1:43110/<site>/?zeronet_peers=<v3-onion-address>:<port>. [...]

if you need a VPS for hosting the new trackers contact me here or by using zeromail, i will manage it for you! :)

1621522848_1PSeiYvqdseW3aoqEV5gddDRr7gCH.body:
> [smashbuckler](#comment_1_114yCZGnUqTUcasBbAKUS6xmhQyDPC1ZXt): What 'fork' are you talking about? Fork of all ZeroNet software or ZeroTalk++?

zeronet software

> [smashbuckler](#comment_2_114yCZGnUqTUcasBbAKUS6xmhQyDPC1ZXt): If you're under linux, I think you can already run this one: https://github.com/zeronet-enhanced/ZeroNetJust press "Code" button and download as zip. This will be the core dir files. [...]

very good! i will give a try! :)
